thread.title: QUIZ! Can you name all 21 players at the top of the all-time Premier League assist table?
thread.title_full: QUIZ! Can you name all 21 players at the top of the all-time Premier League assist table?

author: Richard Innes
title: QUIZ! Can you name all 21 players at the top of the all-time Premier League assist table?
text:
Three answers you should definitely be getting… (Photo: Getty) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Everyone knows the names at the top of the Premier League goals list. 
Alan Shearer, Thierry Henry, Wayne Rooney… most football fans could pretty easily rattle off the superstars at the top end of the all-time goalscorers chart. 
But what if we asked you to do the same for all-time Premier League ASSISTS? 
This quiz asks you to identify the 21 players who have set up the most goals in Premier League history… and gives you 10 minutes to do it. Because it's a lot trickier than it sounds, we've added in a few helpful hints (including the team for which each player made the most Premier League appearances) - but we still fear this might affect your sanity. 
Be sure to let us know how you get on, using @MirrorRowZed on Twitter. Get cracking! Like us on Facebook
